keybinding.label: Open Combat Notes Overview
keybinding.hint: Opens a window with an overview of all your combat notes.

error.missingUser: There was an error retrieving your user data. Please refresh the page and try again.
error.unknownJournalEntry: There was an error reading the added journal entry. Please try again.
error.missingJournalEntryName: There was an error retrieving the journal entry's name. Please make sure it has one and then try again.
